message: You're really curious boy... Well our superior, the guard captain, only wants to pay the woodcutter when he has done his work.

replies.text: Well, this is your problem. Goodbye.

message: OK, maybe you can be of use. Talk to the guard captainn. Maybe you can convince him to pay the woodcutter first. But I have to warn you, he is a stubborn beast.

replies.text: OK, thanks for your advice. I'm going to do that!
